title: analyze.request
description: Request to analyze content for patterns, anomalies, structure, or meaning.

x402.description: x402 envelope describing the verb, version, and optional routing metadata.

input.description: Content to analyze (text, JSON, or encoded payload).

goal.description: High-level purpose of the analysis (e.g., risk assessment, classification, quality review).

hints.description: Optional free-form hints, instructions, or questions to guide the analysis.

limits.description: Optional execution limits for this analysis.

metadata.description: Opaque caller-defined metadata that does not affect semantics.
